None.Name: Infused Winterfall
None.Description: Activate to immediately freeze all enemy units within a 20m radius around every friendly building in the current game for 10 seconds. Units frozen by this ability will receive full damage when attacked. Has a 60 seconds cool-down after having been built. Reusable every 60 seconds.
